snippet: Lakhdar Brahimi, the special envoy representing the United Nations and the Arab League, is scheduled to meet with President Bashar al-Assad of Syria and representatives of opposition groups on Saturday.
abstract: International peace envoy Lakhdar Brahimi is scheduled to meet with Syrian Pres Bashar al-Assad in effort to end the longstanding conflict, which has killed thousands.
lead_paragraph: Lakhdar Brahimi, the special envoy representing the United Nations and the Arab League, is scheduled to meet with President Bashar al-Assad of Syria and representatives of opposition groups on Saturday.

headline.seo: Special Envoy for Syria, Lakhdar Brahimi, to Meet With Assad
headline.main: International Peace Envoy to Meet With Syrian Leader
headline.print_headline: International Peace Envoy To Meet With Syrian Leader
